programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Lies Hidden in My Garden
programme.desc: Seung Jae confesses, linking the smell and sounds to Jae Ho’s secrets, as Sang Eun uncovers more clues.

programme.title: Lies Hidden in My Garden
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Lies Hidden in My Garden
programme.desc: Sang Eun threatens to expose Joo Ran’s secret, prompting her to offer 200 million won.

programme.title: Lies Hidden in My Garden
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Lies Hidden in My Garden
programme.desc: Sang Eun accepts the offer, but when Jae Ho threatens them both, Joo Ran is forced to make a final choice.

programme.title: Level Up
programme.desc: Tired of listening to shareholders’ complaints, Joybuster unavoidably relocates to a new office.

programme.title: Level Up
programme.desc: Joybuster is having trouble developing game as NexViper stops servicing the game engine.

programme.title: Level Up
programme.desc: Dante finds out that Joseph Lee is a big fan of ‘Artemis’ by chance and asks Ya Chae for help.

programme.title: Level Up
programme.desc: Dante finally gets his hands on the game. The game, however, accidentally falls into hands of Ya Chae.

programme.title: Level Up
programme.desc: Dante makes up with Kang Hoon and Kang Hoon takes charge of promoting Joybuster's new game.

programme.title: Level Up
programme.desc: The day has finally come and Joybuster is set to launch the new game. However, game doesn't work properly.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: 1958, Gangwondo. When bumped into the mermaid trapped in small pond, Dam Ryeong releases her into the sea.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae and the mermaid somehow start to live together but the two soon get chased by gangsters at Spain.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: The mermaid starts a tough journey to Seoul to keep her promise with Joon Jae.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Feeling a deja vu, Joon Jae helps the mermaid to get out of the aquarium and the two see fireworks together.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae wonders why he has a slight sense of deja vu to the mermaid, Sim Cheong.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: Joon Jae panics when heard Sim Cheong went to the emergency room but Chi Hyeon says it was just an accident.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: After coming back to Haneul House, Eun Ha Won’s new mission is to go on vacation all together.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: On vacation, love relationship gets more complicated. What happened between Eun Ha Won and Kang Ji Woon?

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: After coming back from vacation, Park Hye Ji gets hurt by Kang Hyeon Min and goes to Kang Ji Woon.

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: Kang Ji Woon and Eun Ha Won takes a drive together. However, Kang Ji Woon gets an urgent call from someone.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Wyjęte spod prawa
programme.desc: Piękna kobieta porywa młodego lekarza do Lost Valley – miasteczka rządzonego przez kobiety. Mężczyźni mogą tam pracować lub korzystać z saloonu, ale nie mają prawa głosu. Niezależność kobiet jest zagrożona przez gang bandytów i nadchodzące wybory szeryfa.

programme.title: Próba Miłości
programme.desc: Kiedy Charlotte Sutter zostaje porwana przez Apaczów, jej brat Sam, wspomagany przez starego pijanego poszukiwacza, wyrusza na jej poszukiwanie.

programme.title: Ślepa Nienawiść
programme.desc: Kiedy w miasteczku zostaje zamordowany indiański wódz, sympatyzujący z nim były szeryf próbuje powstrzymać Indian przed zemstą.

programme.title: Wysoki Teksańczyk
programme.desc: Pięcioro nieznajomych łączy siły w podróży przez terytorium Komanczów. Po odnalezieniu rannego Indianina poznają sekret ukrytego złota. Wyruszają na poszukiwania, ale chciwość zaczyna ich dzielić. Czy przetrwają próbę?

programme.title: Czarny Orzeł z Santa Fe
programme.desc: Gdy Komancze szykują się do wojny, osadnicy chronią się w forcie Eagle Rock. Tajny agent McPherson odkrywa spisek ranczera Mortona, który podburza Indian, by przejąć ropę z rezerwatu. Sojusze się zmieniają, a decydująca bitwa zbliża się.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 25,26,27
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Nadchodzi Sabata
programme.desc: Sabata i Mangosta to rabusie. Po napadzie na bank i w wyniku serii niefortunnych wydarzeń, nawiązują współpracę z pracownikiem tegoż banku, Peterem. Rabusie uciekają, ale na ich drodze staje szef Petera i wynajęci przez niego rewolwerowcy.

programme.title: Wojny drapieżców
programme.desc: Kowboj Dan Somers i potentat naftowy Jim „Hunk” Gardner rywalizują o prawa do dzierżawy działek naftowych na ziemiach Indian w Oklahomie. Walczą także o względy nauczycielki Cathy Allen.

programme.title: Wielki Pojedynek
programme.desc: To klasyczny film spaghetti western z 1972 roku w reżyserii Giancarlo Santi, który wcześniej pracował jako asystent reżysera Sergio Leone przy filmach "Dobry, zły i brzydki" oraz "Pewnego razu na Zachodzie". W filmie występuje Lee Van Cleef jako szeryf, który szuka sprawiedliwości dla człowieka oskarżonego o morderstwo.

programme.title: Niech Żyje Śmierć... Twoja!
programme.desc: Samozwańczy rosyjski książę, meksykański bandyta i radykalna irlandzka dziennikarka łączą siły podczas rewolucji meksykańskiej, by zdobyć bogactwo i sławę.

programme.title: Zwali go Cemetery
programme.desc: John i George McIntire to dwaj naiwni braci, którzy wyjeżdżają do ogarniętego bezprawiem miasteczka na dalekim zachodzie, aby zobaczyć się z ojcem.

programme.title: Podwójny Judasz
programme.desc: Luke Barret traci pamięć w wyniku urazu głowy, którego doznał podczas strzelaniny. Próbując odnaleźć człowieka, który chciał go zabić, Luk odkryje straszną prawdę o swojej rodzinie, a także, że sam był płatnym rewolwerowcem.

programme.title: Ben i Charlie Na Dzikim Zachodzie
programme.desc: Dwóch wspólników przy użyciu forteli i oszustw, próbuje napełnić swoje puste kieszenie. Dwójka okrada bank, a następnie zmaga się z podłym i chciwym szeryfem.

programme.title: Przyjacielu, Spoczywaj w Pokoju!
programme.desc: Oficer Dove Williams ściga grupę banitów, którzy obrabowali dyliżans w Teksasie.

programme.title: Zbuntowany Rewolwerowiec
programme.desc: Mężczyzna szkoli się, żeby stać się najlepszym strzelcem Zachodu i pozbyć się gangu zabójców, którzy zamordowali jego rodziców.

programme.title: Za Zemstę Oddam Życie
programme.desc: Meksykański gang, na którego czele stoi nikczemny Pedro, terroryzuje tereny między Nowym Meksykiem a Arizoną.

programme.title: Czerwień Cassidy
programme.desc: Kobieta powraca do rodzinnego miasta, w poszukiwaniu zemsty za zabójstwo kochanka, który zginął z rąk jej byłego narzeczonego. Rozdarta między miłością, nienawiścią, lojalnością i pragnieniem zemsty, kobieta traci panowanie nad swoim planem.

programme.title: Bronię Się Przed Wrogami
programme.desc: Kilka osób poszukuje trzech jednodolarowych monet, na których wybite są informacje, gdzie jest zakopany skarb.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 28,29,30
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Adios Compañeros
programme.desc: Samotny rewolwerowiec tropi członków bandy, która zabiła jego przyjaciół.

programme.title: Człowiek z Utah
programme.desc: Szeryf wysyła Johna Westona na rodeo, aby dowiedział się, kto zabija tam jeźdźcówmających wygrać nagrodę pieniężną. Barton zorganizował rodeo i planuje wyjechać z całą nagrodą pieniężną ufundowaną przez mieszkańców miasteczka. Kiedy wydaje się, że Weston pokona jeźdźca Bartona, jego ludzie przygotowują dla niego taki sam los, jaki spotkał innych jeźdźców.

programme.title: Łowcy kłopotów
programme.desc: Dwaj skłóceni bracia, którzy nie rozmawiają ze sobą, postanawiają spędzić Boże Narodzenie z matką. Kobieta, mająca nadzieję na ich pojednanie, stara się połączyć rodzinę w ten wyjątkowy czas. Choć ich spotkanie nie jest łatwe, matka nie rezygnuje z próby przywrócenia harmonii i miłości w rodzinie.

programme.title: Trumna Pełna Dolarów
programme.desc: Na granicy z Meksykiem trwa frontierska waśń. Bracia banity Hagena zostali zabici przez rodzinę Nevada's Kida.

programme.title: Śmierci na imię Django
programme.desc: Django, pozornie lojalny kat, ratuje skazanych i tworzy „gang umarłych”, by zemścić się na polityku, który lata temu zabił mu żonę. Rozpoczyna się gra pozorów i sprawiedliwości poza prawem.

programme.title: Samuraj
programme.desc: Koniec XIX wieku. Cesarz Japonii wysyła w prezencie prezydentowi USA świętego kucyka. Ten jednak zostaje skradziony przez Indian, którzy żądają miliona dolarów okupu. Szeryf Blackjack Gideon oferuje dostarczenie okupu i odebranie kucyka.

programme.title: Zwali go King
programme.desc: Łowca nagród tropi bezwzględny gang handlarzy bronią przez granicę z Meksykiem.

programme.title: Fuzzy Bohater
programme.desc: Fuzzy i Shoshena przybywają do małego miasteczka Chedron z zamiarem obrabowania lokalnego banku, którego właściciel, De Koven, próbuje przejąć hipoteki wszystkich farmerów w okolicy.

programme.title: Syn Grzechotnika
programme.desc: Niesłusznie posądzony za grabież wojskowego skarbca, Tony Garrett ucieka i szuka prawdziwych winowajców, żeby się zemścić.

programme.title: Podróżnik z Missouri
programme.desc: Zbiegły sierota, Biarn Turner (De Wilde), próbuje uciec od kłopotów, podróżując na Florydę na początku XX wieku. Trafia do małego miasteczka, gdzie redaktor lokalnej gazety, Doyle Magee (Merrill), postanawia przygarnąć chłopca i dać mu szansę na normalne życie. Zamożny miejscowy farmer, Tobias Brown (Marvin), również interesuje się przyszłością Biarna, ale traktuje młodego człowieka surowo, maskując prawdziwe ukryte uczucia Tobiasa i szczerą troskę. Maniery Biarna i jego chęć niesienia pomocy innym szybko zjednują mu przychylność mieszkańców miasteczka, a on sam udowadnia swoją wartość, przygotowując pozornie niezdolnego do treningu konia do wyścigu, który miasto zorganizuje podczas...

programme.title: Ręce Do Góry Truposzu! Jesteś Aresztowany
programme.desc: Sando Kid (Peter Lee Lawrence), ocalały z rzezi urządzonej przez wojska północy, szuka zemsty. Działa w pojedynkę i uderza w każdą osobę zamieszaną w masakrę.

programme.title: Oklahoma Annie
programme.desc: Właścicielka sklepu angażuje się w walkę z korupcją w swoim mieście, Ma także nadzieję przyciągnąć uwagę przystojnego nowego szeryfa.

programme.title: Strzały na pograniczu
programme.desc: Młody ranczer Kirby zostaje zastępcą szeryfa w mieście rządzonym przez bezwzględnego Sundeena, syna jednego z jego założycieli. Walka o sprawiedliwość dopiero się zaczyna.

programme.title: Dwa Krzyże w Danger Pass
programme.desc: Judy i Alex to rodzeństwo, które ocalało z masakry zleconej przez bezwzględnego Morana.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 31, 32, 33
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Little Big Horn
programme.desc: Rok 1876, Montana. Kapitan Donlin rusza z misją ostrzeżenia Custera przed atakiem Siuksów. Gdy odkrywa romans żony z porucznikiem Haywoodem, łamie rozkazy i decyduje się dotrzeć do celu za wszelką cenę. Misja staje się jego osobistym rozrachunkiem.

programme.title: Pełzająca Śmierć
programme.desc: Agent federalny Alan Fields, pod przykrywką Jonathana Pinkertona, pracownika Lloyds of London, prowadzi śledztwo w sprawie napadu na bank, w którym jeden z trzech złodziei zabił dwóch pozostałych, aby wejść w posiadanie wszystkich pieniędzy.

programme.title: Do ostatniej kropli krwi
programme.desc: Billy Gun kradnie żołd wojskowy. Clive Norton ma odzyskać pieniądze, więc uwalnia z rąk kata El Chaleco — brata Billy'ego, który pragnie zemsty. Wspólnie ruszają tropem zdrajcy i złota.

programme.title: Compañeros!
programme.desc: Szwedzki handlarz bronią i meksykański chłop łączą siły, by uratować intelektualnego przywódcę rewolucji. W trakcie misji przytrafiają im się różne przygody.

programme.title: Rewolwer za Sto Trumien
programme.desc: Po powrocie z wojny secesyjnej Jim Slade odkrywa, że jego rodzice nie żyją na farmie.

programme.title: Zabójczy Dzieciak
programme.desc: Bezwzględny i okrutny kapitan Ramirez poluje na rewolucjonistów w poszukiwaniu Świętego - prawego przywódcy meksykańskiej rewolucji przeciwko Federales.

programme.title: Arizona Colt
programme.desc: Bandyta Gordo uwalnia więźniów i zmusza ich do przyłączenia się do gangu. Arizona Colt odmawia i ucieka do Blackstone City, gdzie Gordo planuje napad. Gdy członek gangu zabija dziewczynę z saloonu, Arizona oferuje, że go wytropi – za pięćset dolarów i noc z jej siostrą.

programme.title: Mason of the Mounted
programme.desc: Canadian Mountie Mason is sent south of the border to look for a horse thief with only a watch chain for evidence. He befriends young Andy and when Calhoun hits Andy, Mason and Calhoun fight. In the scuffle Calhoun's watch with the missing chain is dislodged. Mason then sets out to bring in Calhoun and his gang.

programme.title: Red Ryder: Ride, Ryder, Ride!
programme.desc: Red Ryder encounters bandits trying to hold up the stagecoach carrying the owner of the Devil's Hole newspaper, Libby Brooks and her brother Gerry. Red successfully drives off the attackers but becomes embroiled in further conflict, leading to a duel that nearly claims his life.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Nugget City to tear down a toll-gate on federal land. They are opposed by a woman mayor who uses the gate to keep out riff-raff and raise money for the town's growing needs. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are sent to Texas when it is discovered that a large number of Federal Gold Bonds held by the State of Texas are counterfeit. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo recieves an endowment, but instead of using it for medical school, she wishes to go to Hollywood.Kate meets with Judge Drucker to see if she can legally prevent the girl from goinng. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Visit from a Big Star
programme.desc: A famous movie star (John Vivyan) stays at the Shady Rest Hotel. He wants to get away from the spotlight for a while, but it appears that Uncle Joe has told the entire valley that the hotel has a special guest. .Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Ralph Levy. Episode first aired January 28, 1964

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie make their way to the town of Coffeyville where they run into the Dalton brothers who are seeking to commit a double bank robbery. Also starring Myron healey, Robert Bray and Robert Foulk. Look for future Daniel Boone/Davy Crocket star Fess Parker as a member of the Dalton gang. Episode originally aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark and his partner Frankie head to Tombstone, Arizona to find Doc Holliday with suspicion that Holliday is involved in the gang activity there. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Kim Spalding, Frank Richards, James Craven amd Harry Harvey. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired in 1954. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, an infamous and dangerous train robber escapes from prison, and the Judge sets out to capture him and send him back. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, Mr. Kenyon and his children stumble upon a cache of gunpowder in an abandoned cabin. They take the news to Judge Bean angering Holman who plans on handing the explosives to the hostile Mescaleros. The lawmen must keep it from happening. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: The bank is robbed and the sheriff is killed while everyone is distracted by the wedding between Sand Creeks newspaper editor and a beautiful brunette. The sheriff being the editors best man, the grief-stricken editor begins to escalate the anger towards a suspected drifter with his bias reporting. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie is on the case when homesteaders are forced to sell their land for cheap due to suspicious circumstances. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Colonel and His Lady
programme.desc: An inexperienced young officer complicates matters when a tribe is accused of breaking their treaty.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: George Washington helps a young woman whose land is being threatened by an innkeeper. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper .Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Adam gets hurt while saving a woman from a group of indians, the woman must nurse Adam back to health as the rest of the tribe sets out to find her.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Wagon Wheels
programme.desc: Randolph Scott (Ride the High Country) stars as Clint Belmet, the leader of a wagon train on the way to Oregon. Along the route he and his crew deal with various hardships, including Indian attacks and a fellow named Murdock (Monte Blue) who is out to stop them at any cost. With a cast that includes the likes of Gail Patrick and Billy Lee, this adventure saga was based on a novel by the western master, Zane Grey (Riders of the Purple Sage, Fighting Caravans). Trivia note: The film's original title was Caravans West.

programme.title: Young Buffalo Bill
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars in this highly fictionalized account of Bill Cody's life from director Joseph Kane (Dakota, Flame of Barbary Coast). What it lacks in accuracy is made up for with adventure, as well as and some of Roy's great cowboy songs, including 'Blow Breeze Blow', and 'Rollin' Down to Santa Fe'. Other stars include George 'Gabby' Hayes, Chief Thundercloud, and the lovely Pauline Moore (Young Mr. Lincoln, Charlie Chan at Treasure Island)

programme.title: Arizona Bound
programme.desc: The Rough Riders are called upon to help save a stagecoach line. From 1941, starring Buck Jones and Tim McCoy, plus Horace Murphy and Luana Walters. Directed by Spencer Bennett.

programme.title: Yellowneck
programme.desc: Location shooting in the Florida Everglades add to this dramatic tale of five Confederate deserters trying to get to Cuba. First, they must overcome snake bites, unfriendly Seminoles, and their own conflicts with each other. How many of the five will actually make it out alive? Lin McCarthy, Stephen Courtleigh, and Berry Kroeger star in this little known example of 1950s independent filmmaking.

programme.title: Six Gun Trail
programme.desc: Legendary cowboy star Tim McCoy stars as Captain William Carson, who along with his sidekick Magpie does battle with jewel thieves. Its an actionfilled drama of the West, with plenty of blazing guns and heman adventure! There are a couple of songs, too, including Moon Over the Plains but they arent sung by Tim McCoy. He was too darned tough to sing! Also starring Nora Lane, Ben Corbet; directed by Sam Newfield.

programme.title: The Lucky Texan
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this vintage western. He and George Gabby Hayes strike it rich with a gold mine, only to find their lives complicated by women and crooked officials. Things get even messier when the good guys are framed for murder! Its all action here, particularly since legendary stuntman Yakima Cannut stars as one of the films heavies. Who will win the fight over the gold and the girl? Directed by Robert N. Bradbury for Monogram Pictures. Also starring Barbara Sheldon. (The film was also known as Gold Strike River.)

programme.title: Fighting Caravans
programme.desc: Clint Belmet (Gary Cooper) is a frontier scout with his hands full in this 1931 Paramount Pictures version of Zane Grey's novel. He's helping guide a wagon train across the country, fighting off various attacks on the way, and falling for his lovely Felice (Lily Damita). Belmet's grizzled companions think he should leave the woman alone, but it gets lonely out on the trail, and Felice's charms are hard to resist. Featuring such notable character actors of the period as Ernest Torrence, Tully Marshall, and Fred Kolher, this vintage Hollywood Western still packs a wallop!

programme.title: American Empire
programme.desc: This epic of America's westward march stars Leo Carrillo and Preston Foster in a tale of men building a cattle empire, only to battle rustlers, the weather, and each other! The romantic adventure from director William C. McGann (In Old California, Alcatraz Island) features a strong leading performance by Oscar nominated RKO star Richard Dix (Cimarron, The Ghost Ship) plus cinematography by six-time Oscar nominee Russell Harlan (To Kill a Mockingbird, Rio Bravo).

programme.title: Valley of Vengeance
programme.desc: LUST FOR GOLD BROUGHT MASSACRE TO HUNDREDS! Death Rode the Plains! Directed by Sam Newfield and starring Buster Crabbe (Flash Gordon) and Al St. John, Valley of Vengeance opens with Billy Carson (Crabbe) shooting two affluential town officials after they - and a band of outlaws - had murdered his and Fuzzys (St. John) parents years earlier. Arrested for the shootings, Billy tells the story of the outlaws killing his parents and the events that led to his shooting the town officials. Will Billy be able to prove his innocence and bring and end to the corrupted officials?

programme.title: Red Ryder: Roll, Thunder, Roll!
programme.desc: Red Ryder finds two silver conchas, the trademark of bandit El Conejo, at a raided ranch. He reports the raid to Marshal Bill Faugh but tells him that he suspects that El Conejo, a Robin Hood type character, is being framed.

programme.title: The Two Gun Man
programme.desc: Ken Maynard stars in this vintage western about ranchers under threat from hired gunmen. Director Phil Rosen, whose career dated back to working with Thomas Edison and included several Charlie Chan features, keeps the action hot with help from a strong ensemble, including Charles King, Murdock MacQuarrie, and a horse named Tarzan! Maynard plays Blackie Weed, a marshall going undercover to capture and arrest some cattle rustlers.He finds himself up against some very bad men, and he's soon framed for murder. Watch as Blackie blazes his way to vindication with a .45 in either hand and the flame of righteous anger in his eyes... Kitty: Nita Martin. Joe Kearney: Lafe McKee. Lem Tolliver: Tom...

programme.title: Springtime in the Sierras
programme.desc: Ads for this Roy Rogers classic roared HEAD FOR THE MUSICAL HILLS...ROY IS GUNNIN' FOR THRILLS! And thrills are what you'll get when you watch this fun, action packed B-Western from Republic Pictures. There's some great comic relief from Andy Devine and Chester Conklin, two of Hollywood's all-time greats. This old-fashioned shoot-'em-up was directed by William Witney, who would go on to direct many of television's top western sagas, including Bonanza, Wagon Train, and The Wild, Wild West.

programme.title: Diamond Trail
programme.desc: Diamond Trail is an epic that starts in the speeding taxicabs and illegal barrooms of the east coast, and travels west for its exciting climax. Reporter Speed Morgan (Rex Bell), going undercover as Frisco Eddy, infiltrates Flash Barrett's gang in order to bring them all to justice. But can he get the job done before they learn his identity? With a cast that includes Frances Rich and Bud Osborne, this action tale from director Harry L. Fraser (The Last of the Clintons) is another forgotten classic from Monogram Pictures.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In Ghost Bushwackers, the G-Men are authorized by the Army to do undercover work in the lawless Arizona territory.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the G-Men seek out stolen gold.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to convince two rich women that Shady Rest is a farm. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Guy Scarpitta..Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aried in February of 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Very Old Antique
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) tries to sell the Cannonball to a rich man as an antique.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1964.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho must prove their innocence when they are accused of killing the assistant to the sheriff in Bonanza.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 .This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco tries to help a beautiful woman prove that her brother is innocent after he's arrested for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Following their activity with the Quantrill Raiders, the Younger Brothers return on the scene to commit a bank robbery in Minnesota. Detectives Matt and Frankie work to put a stop to their plan. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, George Wallace, Gregory Walcott, Louise Beavers, and Sheb Wooley. Directed by William Witney. Epsiode originally aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: The notorious John Wesley Hardin kills two people while on a cattle drive to Abilene. Matt and Frankie head out to bring him to justice. Richard Webb stars as John Wesley Hardin. Also starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Howard Negley, Robert Karnes amd John Eldredge. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired April 9, 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, Doc resorts to drastic measures as he desperately seeks money to fund his free public clinic. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the judge learns of a scheme to smuggle guns and ammo to the Indians, and he encounters an unlikely pair of allies in his plan to break it up: an organ grinder and his monkey. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tagg Oakley finds himself in trouble after being tricked into driving a wagon full of gunpowder to Fort Yuma, unaware that Geronimo and his Apache braves are waiting for the wagon to pass. Realizing Tagg is in danger, Annie and Lofty race to the rescue. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie writes to the son of an old female pedlar, unaware that he is a member of an outlaw gang, now on their way to Diablo. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Slim Pickens. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A group of wives living on the frontier aim to join their husbands for the holidays.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by Jams Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Tensions rise between the settlers and the Ottawas. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe teaches sign language to a beautiful deaf girl, but finds himself in trouble when the girls neighbor becomes jealous of the attention Little Joe is receiving from the girl.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Wildfire: The Story of a Horse
programme.desc: Fanning (John Miljan) has his men rustle horses and then blame it on a wild horse named Wildfire. Happy and Alkali arrive and immediately get into trouble with Fanning and his men. When Alkali is shot, Happy catches the outlaws but the Judge not only releases them, he discharges the Sheriff and tries to arrest Happy for rustling! Starring Bob Steele and Sterling Holloway, directed by Robert Emmett Tansey. 1945 (Color).

programme.title: Grand Canyon Trail
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger star in this Republic Pictures feature about the hunt for silver in a deserted ghost town. Songs include 'Colorado Joe' and 'Everything's Going My Way'. Plus, look for Andy Devine as Cookie Bullfincher. Film buffs should look for silent screen foil James Finlayson, a familiar face from various Keystone Cop comedies, as the local sheriff.

programme.title: Jesse James Rides Again
programme.desc: The outlaw Jesse James and his friend are on the run from the law when he is wrongly accused of leading the historic 1876 Northfield, Minnesota bank robbery. With nerve-tensing turns and high-impact action, Jesse rides into a town where a gang is trying to drive area ranchers off their land because there's oil underneath it. Jesse James takes particular interest in the situation of a pretty young woman and her elderly father, whose ranch is being regularly attacked by the gang.

programme.title: The Star Packer
programme.desc: He Dared Death In The Outlaw's Lair! John Travers (John Wayne) takes on a mysterious gang leader known as The Shadow in this vintage western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Director/writer Robert N. Bradbury (Blue Steel, Riders of Destiny) gets the best of a remarkable cast that includes George Gabby Hayes. Of interest to film buffs is that the feature was shot in various California locations by Oscar winning cinematographer Archie Stout (The Quiet Man).

programme.title: Raiders of Red Gap
programme.desc: Bob's Playin' A Mystery Hand... He's Marked For Death By Killer Bullets As Gunfire Echoes Over The Plains! After one of his ranch hands is killed when a gang attacks his ranch, Jim Roberts joins forces with his neighbor in an effort to fight off the Bennett Cattle Co., a company looking to rob them of their land. Things get increasingly dangerous as the company hires Butch Crane, a professional killer, to stop them. Directed by Sam Newfield (Racing Luck (1935), Go-Get-Em, Haines (1936)), Raiders of Red Gap stars Robert Livingston (The Three Mesquiteers (1936), Larceny on the Air (1937)) as Rocky (Lone Rider) Cameron and Al St. John (Billy the Kid Trapped (1942), Border Feud (1947)) as...

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother battles brother in this gritty tale of feuding ranchers in the old west. This story of the Texas panhandle stars such familiar faces as Robert Preston, Chill Wills, and Jack Elam, and was a rare film for its time in that it was filmed almost entirely in Texas with no studio interiors. If for no other reason, watch this one for Prestons performance. If you only know him from The Music Man or Victor Victoria, youre sure to be surprised here! (also, look for John Drew Barrymore as Jef Cloud. He was part of the famous Barrymore family, and father of Drew Barrymore.) Jim Strake: Frank Cordell. The Whip: Dave Kashner. Directed by George Templeton

programme.title: Courageous Avenger
programme.desc: Gold, gangs, and the heroic fight for life! Johnny Mack Brown (Billy the Kid, Coquette) stars in this western thriller about murders going on in a mining community. Its a story full of twists, where the greed for gold is only surpassed by the struggle for life!

programme.title: Born to Battle
programme.desc: Cyclone Tom Saunders starts a ruckus in a Chinese laundry and has to go before a judge. Unable to pay his fine, he is bailed out by a local cattle rancher and agrees to do 30 days' work for him. It's not too long before he becomes enmeshed in a war between rustlers and outlaws.

programme.title: Brothers of the West
programme.desc: Tom Tyler plays Tom Wade, a range detective whose brother has been accused of robbery and murder. Wade has only one clue to prove his brothers innocence: a set of unusual tire tracks. This film was directed by Sam Katzman, who later became known as Jungle Sam for his association with a variety of jungle thrillers, and then as a master of all exploitation genres, from teen horror to flying saucer flicks!

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A cavalry officer sympathetic to the wronged Sioux tribe fixes a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant but a dishonest Indian Agent and a hateful General Custer test the Sioux's patience, threatening to derail the peace-talks. Directed and co-written by Sidney Salkow; starring Dale Robertson, Mary Murphy, J. Carrol Naish. Also, look for legendary character actor Iron Eyes Cody as Crazy Horse.

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: It's the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, the G-Men are sent to the Ozarks to track down gold stolen from the U.S. Government. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: An outlaw gang is stealing gold from Chinese placer miners, then driving off their claims with outrageous taxes. Because they're Chinese, they can't sue the local government agents. With Stoney posing as a Chinese miner and Pat pretending to be a representative of an Eastern engineering company, the U.S. government tries to bring an end to the careers of the outlaw gang and crooked state government agents.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Spur Line to Shady Rest
programme.desc: The Shady Rest hotel is threatened when a railroad detective comes to investigate a forgotten spur line on the property. Creator Paul Henning followed up the success of The Beverly Hillbillies with this charming CBS comedy that ran for 222 episodes. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Quick Hide the Railroad
programme.desc: Kate uses her charms to keep Homer Bedloe from catching the train to Pixley. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Bedloe: Charles Lane. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is shot dead after discovering oil on his property. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951 .It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: An ex-con is released from prison seeking vengeance against those who put him there. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie arrivein the California gold fields where Frankie is kidnapped by the infamous bandit Joaquin Murietta. Without his usualy partner, Matt enlists the help of Captain Harry Love. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, and Robert Anderson. Look for Rick Jason as Murietta. Jason would later go on to star in the popular ABC war series Combat!

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Following the murder of a railroad agent, Matt and Frankie work to bring the vengeful Tiburcio Vasquez to justice. Starring Jim Davis, mary Castle,Anthony Caruso, Edward Colmas, Lillian Molieri, and Eddie Parker. Also, look for Glenn Strange as Sheriff Billy Rowland. Strange was known for playing Frankenstein's monster in several Universal pictures, as well as a recurring role on Gunsmoke. Also, Eddie Parker, who plays a trapper in this episode, was one of Hollywood's most revered stuntmen. Directed by William Witney. Epsiode oringinally aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the Judge and Jeff take on the richest man in the valley over water rights. Though the rich villain has ensnared young Hugh in outlaw ways, the lawmen are determined to set Hugh on a better path. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, Jeff Taggert's brother is accused of robbing the Del Rio bank. While investigating the case, Jeff is implicated in the hold up. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 The Saga of Clement O' Toole
programme.desc: Mistaken for a notorious outlaw, a young man struggles to convince the townspeople that he didnt commit a stagecoach robbery. Initially, Annie and Susan Meriwether believe him, but his innocence comes into question when he is present during a bank robbery in which the outlaws seem to recognize him. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the sheriff off looking for an outlaw, a fake sheriff takes his place, leading to a senseless murder. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This enetertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye becomes embroiled in a fortune hunter's search for treasure. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild.Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook are assigned to escort an accused criminal to his hanging.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After shooting Luke Grayson in self-defense, Ben Cartwright must protect himself from Graysons son, Todd, who seeks to avenge his fathers death.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC.

programme.title: Crashing Thru
programme.desc: Down the danger trail sweeps a crimson fury... as Renfrew rides again! In this action-packed adventure, Sgt. Renfrew must face off against a group of criminals involved in a gold robbery. With his partner, Constable Kelly, wounded in a gunfight, Renfrew must stop the thieves on his own. Directed by Elmer Clifton; starring James Newill and Warren Hull, this is one adventure you won't want to miss!

programme.title: Days of Jesse James
programme.desc: Famed American western actor and singer Roy Rogers once again plays himself in this Jesse James tale that's a twist on the familiar formula. When he is summoned to bring Jesse to justice after the known villain is suspected of a bank robbery, Rogers soon discovers that Jesse has been framed and that the owner of the bank has robbed his own bank posing as Jesse. Fast-paced and fun, this classic Roy Rogers western directed by Joseph Kane (Dakota) features a whole host of original songs sung by the great Rogers himself.

programme.title: Hands Across The Border
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger star in this Republic Pictures western about horse breeders vying for a contract with the U.S. Army. The cast also includes such favorites as Onslow Stevens and Guinn Big Boy Williams, while songs include Hey Hey (It's a Great Day), Dreaming to Music, and The Girl with the High Button Shoes. For movie buffs: The music for the title song, Hands Across the Border, was composed by none other than Hoagy Carmichael!

programme.title: Daniel Boone, Trailblazer
programme.desc: Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) battles Shawnee warriors as he leads a band of settlers into Kentucky in this frontier potboiler from Albert C. Gannaway Productions. Made at the height of Hollywood's fascination with pioneer days, the film also stars Lon Chaney Jr. as Chief Blackfish, and country singer Faron Young as a handsome young suitor for Boone's daughter. There's plenty of action and danger here as the Shawnee are convinced that Boone is trying to steal their land. But Boone is ready, not even fearing death by tomahawk. It isn't how you die, Boone says. It's what you live for.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: During the French and Indian War, Alice and Cora Munro are joined by Magua in the search for their father, a British officer. Little do they know, their father is being held captive by the Huron warriors, and Magua intends to betray them. Uncas, the last surviving warrior of the Mohican tribe and Hawkeye set out to rescue the hostages and the sisters before it's too late.

programme.title: The Dawn Rider
programme.desc: John Wayne was still a few years from major stardom when he appeared as John Mason, a man seeking revenge for his fathers murder. Marion Burns stars as Alice, Masons love interest, while Reed Howes stars as Masons friend and rival for Alices affection. When Mason finally tracks down the man responsible for his fathers death, will Ben help, or stand in his way? Produced by Lone Star Pictures, the group behind many of Waynes early films, The Dawn Rider is a stirring yarn about the price of vengeance.

programme.title: Wolni strzelcy
programme.desc: Syn zabitego policjanta dołącza do byłego partnera ojca, który wprowadza go w tajniki służby. Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson wciela się w postać Malo, syna zabitego gliniarza nowojorskiej NYPD, który razem z dwójką najlepszych przyjaciół dołącza do akademii policyjnej.

programme.title: Heat - Gorączka
programme.desc: Neil McCauley (Robert De Niro), złodziej wysokiej rangi, wzbił się na szczyt kariery dzięki inteligencji, czujności oraz byciu nieuchwytnym. Detektyw Vince Hanna (Al Pacino) jest niezawodny w swoim fachu i tym razem wziął na swój cel McCauleya.

programme.title: Chestnut: Hero of Central Park
programme.desc: Młode siostry osierocone Sal i Rae sądzą, że trafiły w dziesiątkę, kiedy znajdują uroczego szczeniaka Great Dane tego samego dnia, kiedy dowiedują się, że zostały adoptowane ...

programme.title: Zaginiona dziewczyna
programme.desc: ZAGINIONA DZIEWCZYNA - w reżyserii Davida Finchera i oparta na światowym bestsellerze Gillian Flynn - ujawnia tajemnice skrywane przez współczesne małżeństwo.

programme.title: Ares
programme.desc: Francja przyszłości. Władze próbują zapobiec buntowi głodujących ludzi, oferując im brutalny program telewizyjny z udziałem ich samych.

programme.title: Back to 1942
programme.desc: Głód, na który składa się wiele czynników i niszczycielskie skutki, podczas drugiej wojny chińsko-japońskiej, jest kroniką z oficjalnej perspektywy reporterów, generałów, polityków i prawdziwych rodzin.

programme.title: The Negotiator
programme.desc: Danny Roman, biegły policyjny negocjator, chce oczyścić się z fałszywych zarzutów, więc przetrzymuje grupę zakładników w biurowcu, by zyskać czas potrzebny na odkrycie prawdy. Chris Sabian, tytułowy „Negocjator”, podejmuje próbę rozładowania sytuacji i zaangażowania Romana.

programme.title: Ilu miałaś facetów?
programme.desc: Ally Darling jest zaniepokojona po przeczytaniu artykułu w gazecie, według którego ludzie, którzy mieli 20 lub więcej partnerów zaprzepaścili szansę na znalezienie prawdziwej miłości.

programme.title: Redbad
programme.desc: Ten film to epopeja historyczna o powstaniu chrześcijaństwa, sagach i starożytnej legendzie zwanej Redbad.

programme.title: Snajperzy
programme.desc: Podczas wojny antyjapońskiej Yang Haotian, żołnierz Nowej 4. Armii, prowadzi swoich poległych towarzyszy z powrotem do swojej jednostki, gdy spotyka Qin Yu, oficera wywiadu nacjonalistycznego, ściganego przez Japończyków w Lost Cloud Ridge.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Paranoiczny thriller w kosmosie, który podąża za Royem McBride'em w misji przez bezlitosny układ słoneczny, aby odkryć prawdę o jego zaginionym ojcu i jego skazanej na wyprawę wyprawie, która teraz, 30 lat później, zagraża wszechświatowi.

programme.title: Otoczeni
programme.desc: Dwie siostry muszą wykorzystać swoją siłę, zaradność i ogromną odwagę, aby przetrwać przerażający atak rekina.

programme.title: Echo śmierci
programme.desc: Agent specjalny James Webster (Michael Jai White) po powrocie ze służby dowiaduje się, że jego brat został brutalnie zamordowany. Żądny zemsty wyrusza na krwawą krucjatę przeciwko oprawcom.

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: Aby ochronić piękną kobietę i jej syna przed rabusiem, agent FBI Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) otrzymuje zadanie przebrania się za otyłą starszą panią, co ma mu pomóc w zdobyciu informacji na temat przestępstwa z przeszłości.

programme.title: Poświęcenie
programme.desc: Film upamiętniający bohaterską armię chińską podczas wojny koreańskiej z okazji 70. rocznicy udziału Chińskich Ochotników Ludowych w wojnie.

programme.title: Negative
programme.desc: Fotograf-amator Hollis, po sfotografowaniu kobiety na ulicy, jest zszokowany, gdy ta puka do drzwi jego mieszkania i grozi mu życiem. Domagając się, aby on i zdjęcie opuścili z nią miasto, w przeciwnym razie Hollis niechętnie się zgadza.

programme.title: Zjawa
programme.desc: Hugh Glass zostaje zaatakowany przez niedźwiedzia. Ledwo żywy, pozostawiony na pewną śmierć, wbrew wszystkiemu stara się przeżyć. Zmagając się z bezlitosnymi zimowymi warunkami, desperacko brnie przez dzikie tereny, gnany miłością do rodziny i nieokiełznaną żądzą zemsty.

programme.title: Wolni strzelcy
programme.desc: Syn zabitego policjanta dołącza do byłego partnera ojca, który wprowadza go w tajniki służby. Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson wciela się w postać Malo, syna zabitego gliniarza nowojorskiej NYPD, który razem z dwójką najlepszych przyjaciół dołącza do akademii policyjnej.

programme.title: Miłość i inne używki
programme.desc: Anne Hathaway gra rolę Maggie, urzekającej wolnej duszy, która nie pozwoli niczemu, a zwłaszcza bardzo trudnemu osobistemu wyzwaniu na ograniczanie jej. Jednakże kobieta spotyka Jamiego Randalla, którego rolę gra Jake Gyllenhaal.

programme.title: Lekarstwo na życie
programme.desc: Młody mężczyzna przybywa do sielankowego spa w szwajcarskich Aplach, aby zabrać stamtąd swojego szefa. Mężczyzna szybko odkrywa, że cudowne leczenie skrywa mroczny sekret.

programme.title: Echo śmierci
programme.desc: Agent specjalny James Webster (Michael Jai White) po powrocie ze służby dowiaduje się, że jego brat został brutalnie zamordowany. Żądny zemsty wyrusza na krwawą krucjatę przeciwko oprawcom.

programme.title: Honor i siła
programme.desc: Do małego węgierskiego miasteczka przybywa Janos – charyzmatyczny i tajemniczy mężczyzna z wyraźnie przywódczymi aspiracjami, który z miejsca znajduje posłuch wśród dwóch młodych braci z trudnej rodziny.

programme.title: Intersections
programme.desc: Małżeństwo spędzające miesiąc miodowy w Maroku przeżywa śmiertelny wypadek samochodowy na środku pustyni.

programme.title: Monolit
programme.desc: Podczas wyprawy do Los Angeles matka z synem doznają poważnego wypadku, przez który zmuszeni są walczyć o przetrwanie.

programme.title: Odrobina nieba
programme.desc: Marley jest piękna, młoda i odnosi sukcesy na każdym polu, oprócz spraw sercowych. Jej podejście do życia ulega zmianie, gdy wychodzi na jaw, że ma raka.

programme.title: Snajperzy
programme.desc: Podczas wojny antyjapońskiej Yang Haotian, żołnierz Nowej 4. Armii, prowadzi swoich poległych towarzyszy z powrotem do swojej jednostki, gdy spotyka Qin Yu, oficera wywiadu nacjonalistycznego, ściganego przez Japończyków w Lost Cloud Ridge.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: 17-letni David i 15-letnia Jade (Brooke Shields) znajdują się w namiętnym romansie.Ale w miarę jak ich związek staje się coraz bardziej intensywny, zaczyna się to robić - a kiedy David jest wykluczony z widzenia Jade, rozwija się łańcuch tragicznych wydarzeń.

programme.title: Air Bud
programme.desc: Życie samotnego chłopca zmienia się, kiedy zaprzyjaźnia się z „cudownym” psem, który uczy go gry w koszykówkę.

programme.title: Zaginiona dziewczyna
programme.desc: ZAGINIONA DZIEWCZYNA - w reżyserii Davida Finchera i oparta na światowym bestsellerze Gillian Flynn - ujawnia tajemnice skrywane przez współczesne małżeństwo.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Acrimony
programme.desc: Wierna żona jest rozwścieczona krętactwami swego męża, gdy staje się jasne, że ją zdradził.

programme.title: Air Bud: Spikes Back
programme.desc: Buddy zabiera swój show na plaże i rozpoczyna nowy sport: siatkówkę plażową! Życie na plaży nie jest tak relaksujące, jak się wydaje. Wiele tajemniczych zbrodni nęka miasto, a odciski psich łap na scenie wskazują wszystkie palce na Buddiego!

programme.title: Intersections
programme.desc: Małżeństwo spędzające miesiąc miodowy w Maroku przeżywa śmiertelny wypadek samochodowy na środku pustyni.

programme.title: Deadfall
programme.desc: Przygotujcie się na gęstą sieć uwodzenia, zdrady, zabójstwa i chciwości w ekscytującym thrillerze z udziałem Michaela Biehna, Jamesa Coburna i Nicolasa Cage'a.

programme.title: Aftershock
programme.desc: Dziewczynka ocalała po trzęsieniu ziemi opuszcza rodzinę, która myśli, że nie udało jej się przeżyć.
